bugtrap03.bugdomain

Class Subsystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • bugtrap03.bugdomain.notification.Subject
      • bugtrap03.bugdomain.notification.AbstractSystemSubject
        • bugtrap03.bugdomain.AbstractSystem
          • bugtrap03.bugdomain.Subsystem

  • public class Subsystem
extends AbstractSystem
    This class is a subclass of abstract system (versionID, name, description and Childs list). This type also contains a bug report PList, containing the bug reports linked to this subsystem.
    Author:
    Group 03

      • Subsystem

        protected Subsystem(VersionID version,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String description,
                    AbstractSystem parent)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This constructor makes an element of the class subsystem, using it's superclass, AbstractSystem, constructor.
        Parameters:
        version - The versionID (of that type) of this element.
        name - The string name for this element.
        description - The string description of this element.
        parent - The parent (a Project or Subsystem) of this element.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if one of the String arguments is invalid.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the version id is invalid.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the parent is invalid for this subsystem
        See Also:
        AbstractSystem.AbstractSystem(AbstractSystem, VersionID, String, String)

      • addBugReport

        @Ensures(value="result.getTag() == Tag.New && result.getUniqueID() != null")
public BugReport addBugReport(User creator,
                                                                                                            java.lang.String title,
                                                                                                            java.lang.String description,
                                                                                                            java.util.GregorianCalendar creationDate,
                                                                                                            purecollections.PList<BugReport> dependencies,
                                                                                                            Milestone milestone,
                                                                                                            boolean isPrivate,
                                                                                                            java.lang.String trigger,
                                                                                                            java.lang.String stacktrace,
                                                                                                            java.lang.String error)
                                                                                                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                                                                                            PermissionException
        This method creates and adds a bug report to the list of associated bugReports of this subsystem
        Parameters:
        creator - The User that wants to create this bug report
        title - The title of the bugReport
        description - The description of the bugReport
        creationDate - The creationDate of the bugReport
        dependencies - The depended bug reports of this bug report
        milestone - The milestone of the bug report
        isPrivate - The boolean that says if this bug report should be private or not
        trigger - A trigger used to trigger the bug
        stacktrace - The stacktrace got when the bug was triggered
        error - The error got when the bug was triggered
        Returns:
        The create bug report
        Postconditions:
        if creationDate == null: result.getDate() == current date at the moment of initialization
        Postconditions:
        result.getUniqueID() is an unique ID for this bug report
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidCreator(creator) fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidUniqueID(uniqueID) fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidTitle(title) fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidDescription(description) fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidCreationDate(creationDate) fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidDependencies(dependencies) fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidSubSystem(subsystem) fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidMilestone(milestone) fails
        PermissionException - if the given creator doesn't have the needed permission to create a bug report
        See Also:
        BugReport.isValidCreator(User), BugReport.isValidUniqueID(long), BugReport.isValidTitle(String), BugReport.isValidDescription(String), BugReport.isValidCreationDate(GregorianCalendar), BugReport.isValidDependencies(PList), BugReport.isValidSubsystem(Subsystem), BugReport.isValidMilestone(Milestone)

      • deleteBugReport

        public void deleteBugReport(BugReport bugReport)
        Remove the given bugReport from the list of bugReports.
        Only use with Caution: No other changes will be made. (e.g no dependencies or milestones will be changed.)
        Parameters:
        bugReport - The bugReport to delete.

      • cloneSubsystem

        public Subsystem cloneSubsystem(AbstractSystem parent)
                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns a copy of the current subsystem, using the same versionID, name, description and parent, but with a removal of the bug reports addressed to this subsystem.
        Returns:
        the clone of the subsystem
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the VersionID is invalid
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if one of the string arguments is invalid
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the parent is invalid
        See Also:
        Subsystem(VersionID, String, String, AbstractSystem)
